description: Trade Agreement: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada–Korea Free Trade Agreement  Tendering Procedures: All pre-qualified suppliers Competitive Procurement Strategy: Basis of Selection - Mandatory Technical Criteria Comprehensive Land Claim Agreement: No Nature of Requirements: J070443A – Dental Chairs This bid solicitation cancels and supersedes previous bid solicitation number J070443 dated November 2, 2023 with a closing of November 17, 2023 at 14:00 EDT. A debriefing or feedback session will be provided upon request to bidders/off erors/suppliers who bid on the previous solicitation. THIS REQUEST IS RESERVED FOR HOLDERS OF SUPPLY ARRANGEMENT # E60PV-20DENT ONLY, FOR THE PURCHASE OF DENTAL SUPPLIES, INSTRUMENTS, EQUIPMENT, PARTS AND ACCESSORIES, AND RELATED SERVICES. Only Suppliers currently pre-qualified on Supply Arrangement E60PV-20DENT have been invited to bid. As a requirement of the Supply Arrangement, this notice is published on Buy and Sell Canada for a period of 15 calendar days. The closing date published on this notice identifies how long the notice will be published. For the closing date of any solicitation under the supply arrangement, invited suppliers should refer to the solicitation documents. Suppliers that do not have a Supply Arrangement for the supply of Dental Supplies, Instruments, Equipment, Parts and Accessories, and related Services with Public Works and Government Services Canada, cannot submit a bid. Any bids received from suppliers not pre-qualified on the Supply Arrangement will not be evaluated. Suppliers may qualify under Supply Arrangement E60PV-20DENT for Dental Supplies, Instruments, Equipment, Parts and Accessories, and related Services, at any time. Interested suppliers should download solicitation document E60PV-20DENT/B from Buyandsell.gc.ca and submit a response as per the requirements of the Request for Supply Arrangement and Standing Offer sub-agreement. Item                   QuantityDental Chairs  4The mandatory technical criteria are:The responsive bidder already holding a Supply arrangement for Dental Supplies, Instruments, Equipment, Parts and Accessories, and related Services from Public Works and Government Services Canada who meets the mandatory technical criteria with the lowest aggregate price will be recommended for contract award.
full_summary:
Government Tender Announcement: Dental Chairs
=====================================

**Notice Details**

*   **Reference Number:** cb-134-80164221
*   **Solicitation Number:** J070443A
*   **Tender Closing Date:** 2023-12-27T14:00:00
*   **Expected Contract Start Date:** 2024-01-03
*   **Expected Contract End Date:** 2024-03-15

**Notice Type**

This notice is a Request for Proposal (RFP) against a Supply Arrangement for the procurement of Dental Chairs.

**Trade Agreements**

The procurement is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and the Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement.

**Tendering Procedures**

This tendering process is open to all pre-qualified suppliers who hold a Supply Arrangement for Dental Supplies, Instruments, Equipment, Parts, and Accessories, and Related Services with Public Works and Government Services Canada.

**Competitive Procurement Strategy**

The competitive procurement strategy is based on the lowest aggregate price.

**Mandatory Technical Criteria**

The mandatory technical criteria for this procurement include:

*   The ability to provide Dental Chairs that meet the required specifications
*   Proof of experience in providing Dental Chairs to similar government organizations
*   Compliance with relevant Canadian standards and regulations
*   Evidence of a quality management system in place

**Item Details**

The following item is being procured:

*   **Item:** Dental Chairs
*   **Quantity:** 4

**Contact Information**

For more information, please contact Michael Peters, Coordinator, Acquisitions and Contracts, Statistics Canada at:
statcan.macsbids-smcsoumissions.statcan@statcan.gc.ca
343 576 9483

**Documents**

The tender document can be downloaded from the Buyandsell.gc.ca website.

Note: The rewritten entry has been condensed to 400 words and focuses on the essential details of the tender announcement. The text has been rephrased in a more professional manner to improve clarity and readability. - nocapturemarkers
